content: That's a lot of great tips! I think I'll focus on using attention-grabbing captions and asking for engagement in my videos. I've found that my videos tend to perform better than my image posts, so I want to make the most of that. Also, I've noticed that my morning posts tend to get more engagement, so I'll make sure to post my videos during that time. Do you have any tips on how to create eye-catching thumbnails for my videos?
